其中：2006.09-2006.12 德国亚琛工业大学DAAD高级访问学者

日本国立交通安全环境研究所  研究员

清华大学汽车工程系讲师


2014.10 till now  Professor, Department of Automotive Engineering, Tsinghua University

2012.10 till now  Suzhou Automobile Research Institute, Tsinghua University, Vice Director

2010.10-2011.12  Visiting professor, Politechnico di Milano, Italy

2006.9-2006.12   DAAD Visiting professor, RWTH Aachen University, Germany

2003.10-2014.09 Associate Professor, Department of Automotive Engineering, Tsinghua University

2002.7-2003.9    EFF Fellow, Researcher, National Traffic Safety and Environmental Laboratory, Japan,

1997.8-2002.6    Lecturer, Department of Automotive Engineering, Tsinghua University 


智能网联汽车 

车辆动力学及控制

Autonomous Driving

Vehicle Dynamics and control

Vehicle NVH


1.  国家自然科学基金委员会 创新研究群体项目, 52221005, 智能车辆协同决策与控制, 2023-2027

2.   国家重点研发计划课题，2020YFB1600202， “车控操作系统可靠性与功能安全性关键技术研究”，2020-2023

3.   清华大学-丰田联合研究院基金专项, 20213930023, 复杂交通系统中行人行为的理解与交互, 2021-2023

4.   清华大学清华-丰田联合研究院跨学科专项, 20223930039, 面向智慧城市的智能出行系统与示范, 2022-2024

5.   清华大学国强研究院人工智能与机器人领域专项科研, 2021GQS1002, 面向物业室内服务机器人的感知系统, 2021-202309 至 2022-05, 215万元

1.  NSFC Innovative Research Group Project, 52221005, Intelligent Vehicle Collaborative Decision Making and Control, 2023-2027

2  National key R&D project，2020YFB1600202, key technology research on reliability and functional safety of vehicle control operating system，2020-2023

3. Tsinghua-Toyota Joint Research Institute Fund, 20213930023, Understanding and Interaction of Pedestrian Behavior in Complex Transportation Systems, 2021-2023

4. Tsinghua-Toyota Joint Research Institute Interdisciplinary Project, 20223930039, Intelligent Mobility System and Demonstration for Smart City，2022-2024

5. Research in the Field of Artificial Intelligence and Robotics, Guoqiang Research Institute, Tsinghua University, 2021GQS1002, Perception System for Property Indoor Service Robots, 2021-2023


    负责讲授的课程：

1.      “汽车工程II-垂向和侧向动力学”（英文研究生课程，48学时)

2.      “汽车噪声控制”(本科生课程，32学时)

3.      “动态测试与分析”(研究生课程，64学时 部分)

    已指导毕业博士7人，毕业硕士23人。在读博士生7人，硕士生5人。   

   

1.     Vehicle Engineering II : Vertical and Lateral Dynamics (Graduate courses, 48 hours )

2.      Noise control of Automobile (Undergraduate courses, Chinese, 32 hours )

3.      Dynamic Testing and Analysis (Graduate courses, part of 64 hours )


  


1.中国汽车工程学会理事

2.中国汽车芯片产业创新战略理事

3.国家车联网质量检验检测中心专家委员会委员

4.中国汽车芯片产业创新战略理事、汽车芯片标准工作组成员

5.中国智能网联汽车产业创新联盟基础软件工作组成员

6.《声学学报》，《Chinese Journal of Acoustics (in English)》编委；

7.中国汽车工程学会振动噪声分会副主任


1    Director of the Chinese Society of Automotive Engineers

2      Director of Innovation Strategy for China's Automotive Chip Industry

3      Member of the Expert Committee of the National Internet of Vehicles Quality Inspection and Testing Center

4      Member of the Intelligent Connected Safety Branch of the Chinese Society of Automotive Engineers

5   Member of the Basic Software Working Group and the Automotive Chip Standards Working Group of the China Intelligent Connected Vehicle Industry Innovation Alliance

6      Editorial board member of the Chinese Journal of Acoustics

7   Deputy Director of the Vibration and Noise Branch of the Chinese Society of Automotive Engineering



先后获中国汽车工业科技进步一等奖1项（2009年），国家技术发明奖二等奖（2010年）；2010年中国汽车工业优秀青年科技人才奖，教育部技术发明一等奖1项（2012年），中国智能交通科学技术一等奖1项（2012年），国家技术发明奖二等奖（2013年），中国汽车工业科技进步二等奖1项（2020年），中国智能交通科学技术二等奖1项（2023年）


1. Second prize of the State Technological Innovation Award, 2013,“Intelligent safety of vehicles with running environment perception and cooperative control”

2. First Prize of Science and technology of Ministry of Education, 2012 ,“Intelligent safety of vehicles with cooperative perception and control”

3. Second prize of the State technological Innovation 2010, “Noise sources identification and control of running vehicles

4 First prize of China Intelligent Transportation Science and Technology Award, 2012

5. Chinese Automotive Industry Excellent Researcher ,2010

6. First prize of China Automotive Technology Progress, 2009, “Noise sources identification and control of running vehicles”

7. Second prize of China Automotive Technology Progress, 2020

8. Second prize of China Intelligent Transportation Science and Technology Award, 2023






学术成果：

发表学术论文100多篇，已授权发明专利130多项。

近三年发表论文：

2023

1)     Learn Zero-Constraint-Violation Safe Policy in Model-Free Constrained Reinforcement Learning. IEEE Transactions on Neural Networks and Learning Systems. Ma, Haitong; Liu, Changliu; Li, Shengbo; Zheng, Sifa; Sun, Wenchao; Chen, Jianyu.2023

2)     What Truly Matters in Trajectory Prediction for Autonomous Driving? Annual Conference on Neural Information Processing Systems (NeurIPS),2023. Phong Tran, Haoran Wu, Cunjun Yu, Panpan Cai, Sifa Zheng, David Hsu.

3)     AttentionTrack: Multiple Object Tracking in Traffic Scenarios Using Features Attention. IEEE Transactions on Intelligent Transportation Systems,2023. Chuang Zhang , Sifa Zheng, Haoran Wu, Ziqing Gu, Wenchao Sun, Lei Yang.

4)     Safe-state Enhancement Method for Autonomous Driving via Direct Hierarchical Reinforcement Learning. IEEE Transactions on Intelligent Transportation Systems, Ziqing Gu, Lingping Gao, Haitong Ma, Shengbo Eben Li, Sifa Zheng, Wei Jing, Junbo Chen.2023

5)     Distributed MPC for Multi-Vehicle Cooperative Control Considering the Surrounding Vehicle Personality. IEEE Transactions on Intelligent Transportation Systems, Haoran Li, Tingyang Zhang, Sifa Zheng, Chuan Sun. 2023

6)     Accelerating Point-Voxel Representation of 3D Object Detection for Automatic Driving. IEEE Transactions on Artificial Intelligence. JieCheng Cao, Chongben Tao, Zufeng Zhang, Zhen Gao, Xizhao Luo, Sifa Zheng, Yuan Zhu. 2023

7)     智能网联车辆个性化运动控制与测试评价方法，李浩然、郑四发、孙川 等著，ISBN 9787302627388, 清华大学出版社，2023年2月

8)     A Risk Level Assessment Method for Traffic Scenarios Based on BEV Perception, IEEE Symposium on Intelligent Vehicle, 2023

9)     MCHFormer: A Multi-Cross Hybrid Former of Point-Image for 3D Object Detection, Early access article, IEEE Transactions on Intelligent Vehicles, 2023

10)  Accelerating Point-Voxel Representation of 3D Object Detection for Automatic Driving, Early access article, IEEE Transactions on Artificial Intelligence, 2023

11)  F-PVNet: Frustum-Level 3-D Object Detection on Point–Voxel Feature Representation for Autonomous Driving, IEEE Internet of Things Journal, 2023

2022
